thread.title: 2 new Ebola cases in Guinea, WHO says
thread.title_full: 2 new Ebola cases in Guinea, WHO says | News24

author: news24.com
title: 2 new Ebola cases in Guinea, WHO says
text:
Geneva - Two people have fallen ill with Ebola in Guinea after two weeks with no new confirmed cases of the disease in West Africa, the World Health Organisation said on Friday.
WHO spokesperson Margaret Harris told a UN briefing in Geneva that one case was in Forecariah and appeared to be linked to a previously known chain of infection, the other was in the capital Conakry.
Ebola transmission is considered to be over once a locality has gone 42 days without a new case of the disease.
